title: Doraemon Movie 05: Nobita no Makai Daibouken
title_en: Doraemon the Movie: Nobita's Great Adventure into the Underworld
title_jp: 映画 ドラえもん のび太の魔界大冒険
synopsis: Having dreamed of being in a world of magic, Nobita and Doraemon used the what-if-telephone-booth gadget to turn the world into one that is based on magic instead of science. Little did they know that demons exist and threaten this magical world.
